concise_definition: adj. 异性的, 异性恋的; n. 异性恋者

definitions.explanation_en: Relating to or characterized by sexual attraction to persons of the opposite sex; describing a sexual orientation in which individuals are emotionally and physically attracted to people of a different gender.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指与异性性吸引相关或由其特征定义的；描述一种性取向，即个体在情感和身体上被不同性别的人所吸引。
definitions.example_en: She identifies as heterosexual and has been in relationships with men throughout her adult life.
definitions.example_cn: 她自认为是异性恋者，成年后一直与男性交往。

definitions.explanation_en: A person who is sexually attracted to members of the opposite sex; someone whose romantic and sexual orientation is directed toward the other gender.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指对异性产生性吸引的人；其浪漫和性取向指向另一性别的人。
definitions.example_en: In many cultures, heterosexual marriage has historically been the societal norm.
definitions.example_cn: 在许多文化中，异性婚姻历来是社会规范。

comparison.analysis: “Homosexual”（同性恋者）指对同性产生情感和性吸引的人，与 “heterosexual” 形成直接对立。两者都是描述性取向的术语，但指向相反的性别偏好。在社会语境中，这两个词常被用来对比主流与少数性取向。
“Bisexual”（双性恋者）指对两种或以上性别都可能产生吸引的人，与 “heterosexual” 的单一性别偏好不同。后者仅限于异性吸引，而前者则涵盖更广泛的性取向光谱，体现了性取向的多样性。
“Straight” 是 “heterosexual” 的非正式口语表达，含义完全相同，但语体更随意。在日常对话、媒体或流行文化中，“straight” 更常用，而 “heterosexual” 多用于学术、医学或正式语境，更具专业性和中立性。
